page.description: The WIN_SERVICES() function retrieves information about Windows services on a computer.

argument.name: Services
argument.description: A collection containing information about the Windows services of a computer.

argument.name: computer
argument.description: Optional. Default = "." (local computer). The name of the computer to analyze.

page.example: x = win_services() ? x.enum_all() = a347bus Alerter a347scsi Abiosdsk abp480n5 Microsoft ACPI Driver ...
